title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Micro-Credential Program for Enhancing Disaster Risk Reduction and Earthquake Emergency Management Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain the three initial response procedures (preparation, evacuation, reporting) during an earthquake.
Learners can select safety action guidelines for disaster scenarios with over 80% accuracy using mobile devices.
Learners can identify five or more community disaster vulnerability factors and propose preventive measures.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
